meta.description: Optimize the production of math and English workbooks to maximize profit while meeting demand and contract requirements.

sets.name: WORKBOOKS
sets.description: Types of workbooks produced by the company

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of workbooks produced of each type

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[w] * production[w] for w in WORKBOOKS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from workbook production

constraints.name: min_math_workbooks
constraints.description: At least 40 math workbooks must be produced

constraints.name: max_math_workbooks
constraints.description: At most 140 math workbooks can be produced

constraints.name: min_english_workbooks
constraints.description: At least 60 English workbooks must be produced

constraints.name: max_english_workbooks
constraints.description: At most 170 English workbooks can be produced

constraints.name: min_total_workbooks
constraints.description: At least 200 workbooks of either type must be produced
